description: This is a test file for the Sessions React component, testing its rendering, error handling, and topic filtering logic using Jest and React Testing Library.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite for the Sessions page component.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Resets all mocks before each test case.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines an individual test case for a specific behavior of the Sessions component.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the Sessions component into the testing DOM.

methods.name: screen.findByText
methods.description: Asynchronously queries for an element with specific text content.

methods.name: screen.getByText
methods.description: Synchronously queries for an element with specific text content.

methods.name: screen.findByRole
methods.description: Asynchronously queries for an element with a specific role, e.g., alert.

methods.name: fireEvent.change
methods.description: Simulates a change event on an input element.

methods.name: fireEvent.click
methods.description: Simulates a click event on a button.

methods.name: waitFor
methods.description: Waits until the provided expectation is met.
